LandingController.subtitle_3: Turn off your internet, to continue

StepZero.title: Welcome
StepZero.description_1: Connect enables you to connect with your loved ones through asking meaningfull questions.
StepZero.description_2: Select the setting you are in and connect!

StepOne.title: What setting are you in?
StepOne.description: There are questions for every setting. Select one to start.

FinalController.description_1: That was it. We hope you enjoyed connect!
FinalController.description_2: Help others to Connect by sharing the link.

shareButton.title: Connect
shareButton.text: I would like to know you better. Let's connect.
